author: VNExplorer
title: Crazy Miami Dolphins fan goes viral for bravely going shirtless in MINUS 30 degrees during their NFL playoff game against the Kansas City Chiefs
text:
Water bottles inside of the stadium were seen turning to ice in only seconds Temperatures in Kansas City had dropped to dangerous levels below freezing DailyMail.com provides all the latest international sports news
A crazy Dolphins fan went viral after cameras caught him boldly going shirtless in Kansas City on Saturday night, despite the dangerously cold weather at Arrowhead Stadium.
The broadcast crew caught the fan standing up and yelling while wearing nothing more than a Dolphins hat.
Fans were subjected to a feel like temperature of minus 30 degrees during the NFL playoff game.
Videos from inside the stadium had showed water bottles freezing and turning into ice in seconds due to how cold the temperature was.
Fans had also been allowed to bring in blankets that donâ€™t have zippers or compartments as well as portable chargers and non-dry-cell batteries to power heated clothes.
This Dolphins fan is really shirtless in this weather ðŸ˜³pic.twitter.com/NvsaKcbrO1
â€” Complex Sports (@ComplexSports) January 14, 2024
A Dolphins fan went viral after appearing shirtless during the cold temperatures in Kansas city
Temperatures in Kanas City were expected to drop to dangerously cold levels during the game
Videos from inside the stadium showed bottles of water freezing into ice in mere seconds
Additionally, those who wish to protect themselves from the cold seats were allowed to bring in 3ftx5ft pieces of cardboard to sit on.
During both pregame warmups and the game, itself the field at Arrowhead appeared to be covered with a thin sheet of ice due to the frigid conditions.
It felt like -14 degrees with the wind chill around 9:00 am, per FOX 4 in Kansas City but that did not stop loads of fans from fighting through the conditions to come out and tailgate.
ESPN NFL analyst Robert Griffin III tweeted out the that Chiefs game should be postponed due to the weather much like the game between the Buffalo Bills and Pittsburgh Steelers.

author: Hernan Skrypka
title: Quini 6: conocÃ© los nÃºmeros ganadores de este miÃ©rcoles 18 de septiembre
text:
Este miÃ©rcoles 18 de septiembre nuevos afortunados en la Argentina, que resultaron vencedores del sorteo del Quini 6 de esta jornada. Como cada miÃ©rcoles y domingo, se puso en juego la suerte de los apostadores, con un millonario pozo acumulado. En esta nota, conocÃ© quÃ© nÃºmeros fueron los ganadores en la modalidad Tradicional de esta loterÃ­a.
El sorteo Tradicional del Quini 6 de este miÃ©rcoles 18 de septiembre tenÃ­a un pozo acumulado de $400.000.000. Los nÃºmeros vencedores de esta contienda fueron: 09 â€“ 28 â€“ 12 â€“ 23 â€“ 14 -39 . En la ronda de 6 aciertos, con 400.000.000 pesos acumulados y quedÃ³ vacante. A su vez, en la de 5 aciertos, hubo 34 ganadores, y cada uno de ellos se llevÃ³ 462.517,41 de pesos en premios. Mientras que en la de 4 aciertos, se repartieron 3.035,83 pesos entre 1554 ganadores.
La Segunda del Quini 6 , a su vez, tuvo los siguientes nÃºmeros ganadores: 26 â€“ 32 â€“ 22 â€“ 02 â€“ 15 â€“ 44 . El premio, que ponÃ­a en juego $ 577.399.092,48 para los que obtengan los 6 aciertos y hubo un ganador. Con 5 aciertos, por su parte, se registraron 48 ganadores, que se llevaron 327.616,50 pesos en premios. Mientras que en la ronda de los 4 aciertos hubo 2279 ganadores, cada uno de los cuales recibiÃ³ 2.070,06 pesos.
El Quini 6 Revancha reuniÃ³ a los nÃºmeros 22 â€“ 18 â€“ 19 â€“ 12 â€“ 30 â€“ 38 como ganadores, entre los que se repartÃ­an un pozo de $811.052.835,84 quedÃ³ vacante. El Quini 6 Siempre Sale tuvo como ganadores al: 23 â€“ 36 â€“ 35 â€“ 29 â€“ 40 â€“ 25 . Hubo 7 ganadores con cinco aciertos y se llevaron $20.136.377,83.
Mientras tanto, se sorteÃ³ el Pozo Extra del Quini 6. Los nÃºmeros ganadores del Pozo Extra fueron: 1 â€“ 2 â€“ 4 â€“ 5 â€“ 6 â€“ 8 â€“ 11 â€“ 12 â€“ 14 â€“ 21 â€“ 22 â€“ 25 â€“ 26 â€“ 36 â€“ 37 â€“ 40 . AsÃ­, el premio reuniÃ³ a 1925 ganadores que se llevaron $44.155 cada uno.
QuÃ© dÃ­as se sortea el Quini 6
Los sorteos del Quini 6, el juego poceado que forma parte de la Caja de Asistencia Social de Santa Fe y se desarrolla desde hace 35 aÃ±os, se llevan a cabo los miÃ©rcoles y los domingos a las 21.15 horas. El monto del premio depende del pozo que se haya juntado a partir de un porcentaje de la recaudaciÃ³n
Como se juega al Quini 6
Como en todo juego de loterÃ­a, en el Quini 6 el apostador elige 6 nÃºmeros entre el 00 y el 45, y se pone en juego un premio preestablecido en el pozo. Las agencias de loterÃ­a de cada barrio toman las apuestas, y cargan los nÃºmeros del jugador en la capturadora de apuestas. El jugador recibe un comprobante con los nÃºmeros apostados y la acreditaciÃ³n de su jugada.
QuÃ© jugadas ofrece el Quini 6
El Quini 6 reparte premios para quienes acierten los 6 nÃºmeros que jueguen, quienes reciben el premio mayor. Pero los que acierten 5 de 6 tendrÃ¡n el segundo premio y quienes adivinen cuatro de seis, el tercero. En ambos casos, por un pozo menor al inicial.
Hay tres variantes para jugar al Quini 6. Por un lado, el Â«TradicionalÂ», donde se pone en juego el pozo acumulado. TambiÃ©n estÃ¡n las opciones de Â«RevanchaÂ» y Â«Siempre SaleÂ», y para haber jugado a estos, es necesario haber participado previamente del Tradicional. Al dÃ­a de hoy, la jugada Â«TradicionalÂ» tiene un valor de $70 la apuesta. El Revancha vale un adicional de $35, y el Siempre Sale, otro de $25.
Historia del Quini 6
El Quini 6 surgiÃ³ en la LoterÃ­a de Santa Fe como una gran novedad: un juego poceado que ofrece la posibilidad de obtener premios millonarios con un costo muy bajo por jugada. Apenas se lanzÃ³ se convirtiÃ³ en un Ã©xito, siendo el preferido de los argentinos y vendiendo jugadas en todas las provincias. El mayor premio entregado al momento fue en julio de 2021, cuando un cordobÃ©s retirÃ³ de la agencia $362.830.402

author: GlobeNewswire
title: Silynxcom Ltd. Announces Closing of Public Offering | The Manila Times
text:
Netanya, Israel, April 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Silynxcom Ltd. (NYSE American: SYNX) ("Silynxcomâ€ or the "Companyâ€), a manufacturer and developer of ruggedized tactical communication headset devices as well as other communication accessories, today announced the closing of its previously announced underwritten public offering of 1,290,000 ordinary shares at a public offering price of $2.25 per share, for gross proceeds of approximately $2.9 million, before deducting underwriting discounts and offering expenses. All of the ordinary shares were offered by the Company. In addition, Silynxcom has granted the underwriters a 45-day option to purchase up to an additional 193,500 ordinary shares to cover over-allotments, if any, at the public offering price, less underwriting discounts and commissions.
The Company intends to use the net proceeds from the offering primarily for working capital and general corporate purposes.
ThinkEquity acted as sole book-running manager for the offering.
The offering is being made pursuant to an effective shelf registration statement on Form F-3 (File No. 333-285443), including a base prospectus, that has been filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (the "SECâ€) on February 28, 2025, and declared effective on March 7, 2025. The final prospectus supplement relating to the offering was filed with the SEC on April 2, 2025, and is available on the SEC's website at http://www.sec.gov . Copies of the final prospectus supplement and the accompanying prospectus relating to the offering may be obtained from ThinkEquity, 17 State Street, 41 st Floor, New York, New York 10004.
This press release shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy these securities, nor shall there be any sale of these securities in any state or other jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of any such state or other jurisdiction.
